articles.description: DeMarcus Cousins and Markieff Morris, who took Cousins' roster spot on the Lakers last season, were both ejected from Sunday's game.
articles.content: The Los Angeles Lakers exchanged DeMarcus Cousins' roster spot for Markieff Morris back in February. In Cousins' first game against his former team Sunday, he and Morris got in a testy exchange of th… [+3180 chars]

articles.title: Crow for life? Versatile defender inks three-year extension - AFL
articles.description: Brodie Smith has missed just one game over the past two seasons
articles.content:
ADELAIDE'S Brodie Smith has again turned his back on free agency to sign a new three-year deal with the Crows.

articles.title: ‘Just absolutely insane’: US loses it over Nickelodeon’s NFL takeover - Fox Sports

articles.content:
On Monday (AEDT), the NFL decided to appeal to a new market; broadcasting a playoff contest between the New Orleans Saints and Chicago Bears on Nickelodeon in the US.
